SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
The Admin class represents the admin account of the Camp management system.
Camp
The Camp class represents a camp with a specific information The Camp compose of CampConstraints and references to attendee, camp committee, staff, enquiry, and suggestion.
CampCommittee
The CampCommittee represents a student who is a committee member of the camp.
CampConstraints
The CampConstraints provides the rules and constraints checking for camp registration.
CampException
The CampException class handles the Exception Error related to the camp registry and action.
CampInformation
The CampInformation stores the necessary attributes for the camp in this camp management system, such as ID, name, dates, registration deadline, locaiton, etc.
ChangePasswordAdminMenu
The ChangePasswordAdminMenu class provides the execution logics of the admin menu for changing user's password.
ChangePasswordMenu
The ChangePasswordMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for changing user password.
ComparableAttribute<T>
The ComparableAttribute class provides the comparator for specific type specified by the subclass, the name of the associated attribute to compare.
ConsoleReaderDate
The ConsoleReaderDate provides the method for reading and parsing the date from the input in the console.
ConsoleReaderDateList
The ConsoleReaderDateList provides user input reader for Date from console.
ConsoleReaderInteger
The ConsoleReaderInteger provides the method for reading and parsing the integer from the input in the console.
ConsoleReaderString
The ConsoleReaderString provides the method for reading and parsing the string from the input in the console.
CreateCampMenu
The CreateCampMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for the staff to create a new camp.
CreateUserMenu
The CreateUserMenu class provides the execution logics of the admin menu for creating new user account.
CustomPrinter<T>
The CustomPrinter class is an abstract class for printing object of a any type T.
CustomPrinterCamp
The CustomPrinterCamp class provides a method to print all camp details (name, camp ID, description, location, etc.) to the user.
CustomPrinterEnquiry
The CustomPrinterEnquiry class provides a method to print enquiry details (enquiry message, submission detail, reply detail, date of last updated) to the user.
CustomPrinterSuggestion
The CustomPrinterSuggestion class provides a method to print suggestion details (suggestion message, submission information, reply information, status, date last updated) to the user.
DatabaseWritable
The DatabaseWritable is implemented by all classes that can write to the database.
DateInputFormatter
The DateInputFormatter class provides a method to parse a comma-separated string of dates list and converts into ArrayList of Date objects.
DBException
The DBException class provides exception in case there is error modifying the database.
DBReader
The DBReader class provides the method to reads the information from the database (the text files in LOG folder) and adds the information from database to the Registry.
DBWriter
The DBWriter class provides the method to writes the information from the Registry to the database (the text files in LOG folder).
DeleteCampMenu
The DeleteCampMenu class provides the execution logics of the staff's menu for deleting the camp.
DeleteEnquiryMenu
The DeleteEnquiryMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for deleting the user's submitted enquiries.
DeleteSuggestionMenu
The DeleteSuggestionMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for deleting user's submitted suggestion.
Driver
The Driver class provides the method to control the account menu, and the UI of each menu.
EditCampMenu
The EditCampMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for editing the camp details.
EditEnquiryMenu
The EditEnquiryMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for editing user's submitted enquiry.
EditSuggestionMenu
The EditSuggestionMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for editing user's submitted suggestion.
Enquiry
The Enquiry class represents the enquiry sent from student to camp committee or staff.
Filters
The Filters class provides utility methods for filtering the camp based on faculty of student.
GenerateCampReportCommitteeMenu
The GenerateCampReportCommitteeMenu class provides the execution logics of the committee's menu for generating the camp report.
GenerateCampReportStaffMenu
The GenerateCampReportStaffMenu class provides the execution logics of the staff's menu for generating the camp report.
IConsoleReader<T>
The IConsoleReader interface defines a contract for reading input of type T from the console.
IMenu<T extends User>
The abstract class IMenu provides a template for common functionality for all menu pages in this camp management applciation.
InputException
The InputException class handles the Exception Error related to the reading the input.
LockUserMenu
The LockUserMenu class provides the execution logics of the admin menu for lock the user's account.
Main
The Main class to runs the camp management system
MenuFactory
The MenuFactory class provides static methods to generate menus for different user based on roles such as students, committee members, staff, and admin.
Parsers
The Parsers provides the methods to validate, parse and convert the value between string and each object type This include Date and Ingeter.
PrimaryKeyCounter
The PrimaryKeyCounter keeps track of number of camp, enquiry, and suggestion in the system Registry
PrintProfileMenu
The PrintProfileMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for printing the user profile.
ProcessSuggestionMenu
The ProcessSuggestionMenu class provides the execution logics of the staff's menu for processing the suggestion.
RaiseEnquiryMenu
The RaiseEnquiryMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for submitting an enquiry to a camp committee.
RegisterCampCommitteeMenu
The RegisterCampCommitteeMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for registering to a camp as a camp committee.
RegisterCampStudentMenu
The RegisterCampStudentMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for registering to a camp as an attendee.
Registry<T,ID>
The Registry class is a generic registry that associates objects of type T with unique ID of type ID.
RegistryFactory
The RegistryFactory class is a factory for creating and holding registry needed for the camp management system.
ReplyToEnquiriesMenu
The ReplyToEnquiriesMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for replying to attendee's enquiries.
ReplyToEnquiryStaffMenu
The ReplyToEnquiryStaffMenu class provides the execution logics of the staff's menu for replying to student's enquiries.
Sortable<T>
The Sortable abstract class is used for sorting an ArrayList of objects of type T.
SortableCamp
The SortableCamp class extends the abstract class Sortable and provides sorting attributes for objects of type Camp.
SortableEnquiryCommittee
The SortableEnquiryCommittee class extends the SortableEnquiryStudent class It provides additional commitee-specific sortable attributes for the object of type Enquiry
SortableEnquiryStudent
The SortableEnquiryStudent class provides student-specific sortable attributes for the object of type Enquiry
SortableSuggestionCommittee
The SortableSuggestionCommittee class extends the Sortable class and provides sortable attributes specific to committee-related sorting attributes for Suggestion objects.
SortableSuggestionStaff
The SortableSuggestionStaff class extends the SortableSuggestionCommittee class and provides sortable attributes specific to staff-related sorting attributes for Suggestion objects.
Staff
The Staff represents the staff that manages the camp management system.
Student
The Student represents the attendees of the camp.
SubmitSuggestionMenu
The ViewMySubmittedSuggestionsMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for submitting a suggestion to the staff.
Suggestion
The Suggestion class represents the suggesiton sent between staff and camp committee.
TXTDB<T,ID>
The TXTDB abstract class is a base class for handling text-based database operations.
TXTDBAdmin
The TXTDBAdmin class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for Admin objects.
TXTDBCamp
The TXTDBCamp class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for Camp objects.
TXTDBCampCommittee
The TXTDBCampCommittee class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for CampCommittee objects.
TXTDBEnquiry
The TXTDBEnquiry class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for Enquiry objects.
TXTDBStaff
The TXTDBStaff class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for Staff objects.
TXTDBStudent
The TXTDBStudent class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for Student objects.
TXTDBSuggestion
The TXTDBSuggestion class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for Suggestion objects.
TXTDBUser
The TXTDBUser class extends the TXTDB class and is specifically designed for handling text-based database operations for User objects.
TXTFileReportDBWriter
The TXTFileReportDBWriter class is for writing and formatting camp reports to text files.
UnlockUserMenu
The UnlockUserMenu class provides the execution logics of the admin menu for unlock the user's account.
User
The User class represents a user in the system and implements the UserActions interface.
UserActions
The UserActions provides an abstract for all required action for the User class This includes changing password, logging in, logging out, and getting each attribute.
UserException
The UserException class handles the Exception Error related to the user action.
UserLoginDriver
The UserLoginDriver class provides the method for authenticating users and control the user input and UI during user login.
UserLogoutMenu
The UserLogoutMenu class provides the execution logics of the logging out menu.
ViewAllEnquiriesMenu
The ViewAllEnquiriesMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing all enquiries submitted from camp attendees.
ViewAllEnquiriesStaffMenu
 
ViewBlockedDatesMenu
The ViewBlockedDatesMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing the date this user is not available.
ViewCampStaffMenu
The ViewCampStaffMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing all of the camp in the camp management system.
ViewCampStudentMenu
The ViewCampStudentMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing all the camps visible to the specific student.
ViewCreatedCampsStaffMenu
The ViewCreatedCampsStaffMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing all camps created by a specific staff account.
ViewMyCommitteeCampMenu
The ViewMyCommitteeCampMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing the camp the student has registered as a camp committee.
ViewMyRegisteredCampMenu
The ViewMyRegisteredCampMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing all the camp the student has registered as an attendee
ViewMySubmittedEnquiriesMenu
The ViewMySubmittedEnquiriesMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing the submitted enquiries.
ViewMySubmittedSuggestionsMenu
The ViewMySubmittedSuggestionsMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing the submitted suggestion to the staff.
ViewSuggestionMenu
The ViewSuggestionMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for viewing all suggestions submitted.
Visibility
The Visibility interface represents objects that can be toggled between hidden or shown.
WithdrawCampMenu
The WithdrawCampMenu class provides the execution logics of the menu for withdrawing from a camp.
